item.title: Pigeon mess, 25 to 103 Rowley Gardens., 16th October
item.description:
Fire Brigade's dry-riser valve enclosure & pipe covered in droppings from pigeons that alight on the roof parapet. Mess is cleaned off, but the pigeons should be prevented from landing on the parapet.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rowley Gardens, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains never cleaned. Build up of leaves, excessive litter and debris, including black making this SINGLE LANE ROAD WITHOUT ANY PAVEMENT VERY DANGEROUS ,BRAMBLES SCRATCH CARS,AND RESTRICT SAFE PASSING OPPORTUNITIES.., 16th October
item.description:
Shame was how I felt about the poor state of Rectory Lane Sidcup, when FootscrayMeadows was used for a Sports Event last Saturday . Competitors from Ashford, Cambridge, Beckenham and many other areas in Kent drove or even WALKED past this rubbish. The road has not been cleaned for months, yet the other end of Rectory Lane Sidcup benefited from the actions of the mini road sweeper this week. The neglect of Rectory Lane does not show Bexley in a good light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bin broken and not emptied on regular collection, 16th October
item.description:
This recycling bin in the Northfield House carpark (Peckham Park Road/Old Kent Road end of block, alongside bike lockers) was marked as 'broken-do not use' a fortnight ago. However as it is still in place it is still being used. On Wednesday 15 October it was not emptied in the weekly collection (the one next to it was). While the bin may be broken, it is not acceptable to mark it as broken, leave it in place, and then fail to empty it. If it is broken, it needs be replaced (not simply removed - as this area gets a lot of waste, much of it flytipped from shops on Peckham Park Road, and the bins are usually full and overflowing for much of the week. This is an additional issue that also needs addressing). Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Park Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
